source:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_SEQ_00Uin Nee has a surprisingly thoughtful concern.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラス・ジョブでのみ進行します。

リダ・ラーンのウィン＝ニイは、子どもたちに夢のヒミツキチを贈りたいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_TODO_00<tab>Search for giant mushroom spawn in Father Collard's Chambers.
target: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_TODO_00<tab>コラード菌床付近の指定地点を調べ、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E900301 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the giant mushroom spawn to Uin Nee.

TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Tell me, my favorite mortal, have you ever had a hideout? Mortal children seem to love them, so I thought─why not try it out? Then I hid in a log for five days and five nights, and no one found me. It was <var 1A 02 /var>amazing<var 1A 01 /var>! Then I got bored, so I came back.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_001ヒトの子どもは、ヒミツキチ？……というものに憧れるらしいの。
仲良しの数人だけが知るヒミツの場所……素敵だわ！
アナタもお友だちと、作ったことあるのかしら？

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Anyway, while I was there, it occurred to me that the children in the Rak'tika Greatwood aren't usually allowed to leave their villages. And that means that they can't make hideouts! I mean, sure, they could hide <var 1A 02 /var>in<var 1A 01 /var> the village, but people would find them.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_002でもね、ラケティカ大森林に住む子どもたちは、
集落から森へと出ることを、許されていないみたい。
おとなの目がある集落の中じゃ、ヒミツキチがヒミツにならないわ！

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_003<tab>And it doesn't count if other people can find it, right? Right!? If any old adult can stumble across it, that's not a hideout, that's just <var 1A 02 /var>sad<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_003だから、ワタシたちが夢の中で叶えてあげましょう、というワケ♪
ン・モゥ族が住んでいる、おっきなキノコなら、
と～ってもカワイイ、ヒミツキチになると思うの。

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_004<tab>I decided right then and there that I would dream up a perfect hiding place for those poor little darlings. And what better to make it from than one of those giant mushrooms the Nu Mou live in? Nothing! There's nothing better. It was a rhetorical question.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_004それで、キノコの種菌を分けてってお願いしてみたんだけど……
悪～いアンチロウに種菌を盗まれて、困っているんですって。
でも、奴らから取り返したら、それを譲ってくれるというの。

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_005<tab>Tragically, Father Collard's Chambers is absolutely swarming with the lawless ones, which makes it impossible to harvest mushroom spawn. If something isn't done, my brilliant plan will never come to fruition, and...I'm sure you can see where this is going. Do it for the children!
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_005そこで、強いアナタにお願いよ！
アンチロウたちの根城、コラード菌床へ行って、
盗まれた「」を取り返してきて！

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_BALLOON_000_010<tab>Halt! Who dares lay hands on our fungi?
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_020<tab>Oh, there you are! You know, I realized after you left that I didn't tell you how to tell one mushroom spawn from another. I do hope you figured it out!
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_020ああよかった、いくら強いアナタでも心配してたのよ！
「」は取り返せたかしら？

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Oh, well done! Such a clever mortal you are. We should be able to grow this one nice and tall, then pop it into a dream, and...voila! Greatest hideout ever. We don't even need to put it in a dank old cave! Imagine the possibilities...
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_021わぁ、ありがとう！
この種菌から、あのおっきなキノコのおうちができるのねぇ……！
がんばって大きく育てて、立派なヒミツキチを作ってみせるわ！

source: TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_022<tab>Wait─I don't have to imagine them! I can make them. Haha, fantastic!
target:
TEXT_BANPIX123_03711_UINNEE_000_022ン・モゥ族の洞窟みたいにジメジメした場所は嫌だけど、
夢の中なら、木の上なんかに作るのもいいかもしれないわ♪
アナタもきっと、遊びにきてね！
